actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-212.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 370 - 52 (Record Vote No: 188).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4331) to amend the Omnibus Reconciliation Act of 1981 to restore minimum benefits under the Social Security Act, and waiving points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 3982) the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4331. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3982.

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4331) to amend the Omnibus Reconciliation Act of 1981 to restore minimum benefits under the Social Security Act, and waiving points of order against the conference report on the bill (H.R. 3982) the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981.
